tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE datasource_unified_view (
   id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   data_source_1_column_1 VARCHAR(255),
   data_source_1_column_2 INT,
   data_source_2_column_1 VARCHAR(255),
   data_source_2_column_2 DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE unified_view (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  age INT,
  salary INT,
  address VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE unified_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    email VARCHAR(50),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50),
    salary DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE unified_data_view ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    data_source_1_id INT REFERENCES data_source_1(id), 
    data_source_2_id INT REFERENCES data_source_2(id), 
    data_source_3_id INT REFERENCES data_source_3(id), 
    unified_data VARCHAR(255) 
);
